name: Granny Horror House
description:
Your granny is a zombie. She is also a little strange. She is trying to kill you and your brother Elias after your parent gone for a business.

And also be careful, it looks like she is a ghost now, so this will be a horror games. Can you escape from granny's house? Is your grandmother a ghost? Or a zombie? Or it is you that actually the ghost?

Find out there if you dare!
